Control Name: Protects Personal Information—The entity protects personal information during system design, development, testing, implementation, and change processes to meet the entity’s objectives related to privacy.

control_attributes.Control: Protects Personal Information—The entity protects personal information during system design, development, testing, implementation, and change processes to meet the entity’s objectives related to privacy.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC8.1 The entity authorizes, designs, develops or acquires, configures, documents, tests, approves, and implements changes to infrastructure, data, software, and procedures to meet its objectives.
